text: The 1938 Rhode Island gubernatorial election was held on November 8, 1938. Republican nominee William Henry Vanderbilt III defeated Democratic incumbent Robert E. Quinn with 54.17% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *William Henry Vanderbilt III, Republican *Robert E. Quinn, Democratic Other candidates *Walter E. O'Hara, Independent *Morris Kominsky, Communist ===Results=== ==References== 1938 Rhode Island
title: 1938 Rhode Island gubernatorial election
